item.title: Home - Strandbeest
item.description: Theo Jansen is engaged in creating new forms of life: the so called strandbeests. Skeletons made from yellow plastic tube (Dutch electricity pipe) are able to walk and get their energy from the wind. They have evolved since their inception in 1990 and have been divided into 12 periods of evolution. Their properties determine this period. You will find the most important types of strandbeests at geneology.

item.title: You’re Probably Implementing Click and Drag Wrong
item.description: Any implementation of mouse-based interaction is basically a small state machine that parses events. There are more possible user inputs in more possible sequences than most people usually anticipate, though, and as everyone knows, writing correct stateful code is impossible.
